title: Rihanna reveals her wedding dress designer of choice
text:
Rihanna reveals what she has in mind for her dream wedding dress

She’s an inspiration and idol to millions of young women around the world – so when Rihanna says what she has in mind for her dream wedding dress, you better believe people are going to listen!

The pop star and Fenty creator told Vogue editor-in-chief Anna Wintour that it “would probably be a collaboration between myself and John Galliano, of course”.

The 31-year-old has been close to the British fashion designer since early in her career. A blend of her trademark edginess and his couture style would certainly make for a very interesting bridal look!

Read more: Rihanna just made another iconic move with the announcement of her coffee-table book

As for the groom? Well she’s still going strong with her Saudi billionaire boyfriend, Hassan Jameel (31), who she’s been seeing since 2017.

While Rihanna doesn’t mention Hassan by name she does reveal in the latest issue of Vogue, which also has her on the cover, that she’s “in an exclusive relationship” and has been “for quite some time” before adding, “It’s going really well, so I’m happy.”

Read more: DJ Zinhle and 5 other celebrities who are building empires outside their stardom

As for kids, she dodged the question, quipping, “'I don't think about stuff like that. I don't know, God's plan. But I look forward to all the pregnancy rumours after this interview.”

Great news for her many fashionista fans is that later this month she’s releasing a coffee table book featuring a thousand images of her most iconic looks.

Sources: Daily Mail, Instagram
